David Goodger notes: My wife runs a <nowiki>[[http://pages.infinit.net/mayumi/|Bed&Breakfast]]</nowiki> out of our home, about an hour by train & foot from the site.  We have one (and possibly two) rooms available during the conference, which we'd like to offer (free) to any non-smokers attending.  High-speed wireless included!  Contact me if you're interested: goodger@python.org.
